title: Gohokoku Ijiwaru Tenshi Ni Dakaremasu
alternative_title: [Report] Ijiwaru Tenshi ni Dakaremasu ; Attention! My Angelic Boyfriend is a Tease! ; Gohokoku Ijiwaru Tenshi NI Dakaremasu ; 【ご報告】いじわる天使に抱かれます ; いじわる天使に抱かれます
status: [Report] Ijiwaru Tenshi ni Dakaremasu ; Attention! My Angelic Boyfriend is a Tease! ; Gohokoku Ijiwaru Tenshi NI Dakaremasu ; 【ご報告】いじわる天使に抱かれます ; いじわる天使に抱かれます
description:
Description :
        Mao Endou is known as "The Demoness" of her workplace; she's hyper-competent, strict, and ready to scold! However, she has a secret... she's dating the "angel" of the office, the kind and handsome Seiji Amatsuka! Seiji is the only one who knows that Mao isn't really the strict career woman she seems to be, and after dating in secret for half a year, the two are as in love as ever. But, there's just one small problem...
